title: [CLIENT] 3 METHODS Reduce Open Beta Client Lag

embed.description: Hey Guys, it is YSBeezito here and today I'm going to show you how to Reduce lag on the new open beta client for league of legends. (ALSO CLOSE OFF PROGRAMS YOU DONT NEED Not in the video xD.) So sit back Relax and Have a GREAT day!

body:
In this video i'll show you how to reduce open beta client lag. 
Also check the description for more ways to reduce open beta client lag.

replies.body:
here's my method.
don't use it. its objectively worse.

lol. I like it. It gave me the most LP in the world xD:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d86535tWtXo
(^Me discussing the issue in a comical sense.)

Anyways it is soon to become the normal client for everyone to use lol. I wouldn't be surprised if they took away the legacy client option. However if they do this they need to make a low performance option for lower end computers to run the client smoothly.
